item.title: NBA 2K12 Questions
item.dc:creator: @Porygon Porygon
item.description:
@Porygon wrote:

2K13 is great. An easy way to obtain VC is:

  1. Set the time of a match to 12 minutes.
  2. Grab a good time like the Heat or OKC and just do a normal match against a bad team.
  3. Start off playing as the good team, switch over to the bad team, switch back, then switch to spectator.
  4. Let the game play, and you’ll get VC at the end. Repeat.

It’s a good way to do it without any effort.
